version_description:
- Introducing the new in-app Feedback page! Please let us know your feature requests, bug reports, or general thoughts and we will be sure to follow up.
- General bug fixes and improvements

- Introducing the new in-app Feedback page! Please let us know your feature requests, bug reports, or general thoughts and we will be sure to follow up.
- General bug fixes and improvements

- You can now have TMS Tasks store your password to automatically log you back in
- You can open a task in the Cloud Translation Environment in your browser directly from the TMS Tasks app
- Bug fixes and stability improvements

- You can now have TMS Tasks store your password to automatically log you back in
- You can open a task in the Cloud Translation Environment in your browser directly from the TMS Tasks app
- Bug fixes and stability improvements
